attributes.action: Demand the resignation of the Home Secretary
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Prime Minister took office promising a new era of open government and an end to spin. The attempted cover up of illeagal immigrants employed for public service security work show members of the government to be, at best, willing to mislead the public.  Should the Prime Minister not want his government to be tainted by spin, as Mr Blair's was, the Home Secretary should resign.
